item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "You can't be happy unless you're unhappy sometimes"." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Berterimakasihlah pada segala yang memberi kehidupan." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Accept who you are; and revel in it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "A certain type of perfection can only be realized through a limitless accumulation of the imperfect." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Life, he realize, was much like a song. In the beginning there is mystery, in the end there is confirmation, but it's in the middle where all the emotion resides to make the whole thing worthwhile." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Time is priceless, but it’s Free. You can't own it, you can use it. You can spend it. But you can't keep it. Once you've lost it you can never get it back." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The secret of life, though, is to fall seven times and to get up eight times." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Berputar menjadi sesuatu yang bukan kita, demi bisa menjadi diri kita lagi." -- Dee

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "What are the chances you’d ever meet someone like that? he wondered. Someone you could love forever, someone who would forever love you back? And what did you do when that person was born half a world away? The math seemed impossible." -- Rainbow Rowell

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Travel is never a matter of money but of courage" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Gabriella add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "It's so strange how life works: You want something and you wait and wait and feel like it's taking forever to come. Then it happens and it's over and all you want to do is curl back up in that moment before things changed." -- Lauren Oliver
